short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove feed and notifications from Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin ... To stay productive !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on injects CSS and Javascript to remove feed and notifications in Facebook, Twitter or Linkedin. You can choose to active or not this behavior directly on the page (next to the URL).
